articles.content: The Indian market showed slight gains last week despite a temporary slowdown, lacking new catalysts. Mid and small-cap stocks outperformed, driven by renewed optimism in growth sectors. The FOMC meet… [+6622 chars]

articles.title: How Maruti Suzuki Wasted Rs 1000 Crores! - MotorOctane
articles.description: Maruti has found success in india, but not everything has been smooth sailing and its biggest blunder happened with its diesel engines
articles.content: Maruti Suzuki, the most successful manufacturer in India, held a market share of 50 percent in 2020 in the country. The BS6 emission norms hit Maruti hard and it had to discontinue its diesel engine … [+4001 chars]

articles.title: Mcap of five of top-10 most valued firms jumps Rs 85,582 cr; LIC biggest gainer - Moneycontrol
articles.description: Last week, BSE benchmark Sensex climbed 299.41 points or 0.39 per cent. The 30-share barometer hit its all-time high of 77,145.46 on June 13.
